title: Industry Group Calls for More US Investment in Chip Design

title: Sam Bankman-Fried Says He ‘Will Testify’ to Congress on FTX Collapse
description: Samuel Bankman-Fried, then CEO of FTX, testifies on Capitol Hill in Washington, on Feb. 9, 2022. (Saul Loeb/AFP via Getty Images)

title: Daily Suspensions of Twitter Accounts Exploiting Child Sex Abuse Material Nearly Double After Musk Takeover

title: Musk’s ‘Name and Shame’ Strategy Works as Apple Resumes Advertising on Twitter
